txt.en: This water-bucket looks empty and needs to be filled. Grab a bucket of water from the nearby well to fill the bucket and provide the horse with water.
The Stable-helper wants you to help the newly-arrived horse to settle into his new stall at the Combe stables.
The well for water can be found in the centre of Combe, near the horse's stall.
Carry the water to the horse's water-bucket
